results.description: Liverpool boss J端rgen Klopp says his side respect all club cup competitions but says a solution needs to be found to fixture congestion which is becoming an annual problem.
results.shortTitle: We need to find a solution - Klopp on fixture congestion
results.title: J端rgen Klopp on fixture congestion

results.description: J端rgen Klopp says "we cannot carry on like this" after it was decided his Liverpool side will play two games in the space of 24 hours in December.
results.shortTitle: We cannot carry on like this - Klopp
results.title: J端rgen Klopp: Liverpool manager says 'we cannot carry on like this' over fixture congestion

results.description: Liverpool will field two different teams in as many days in order to fulfil fixtures in the EFL Cup and Fifa Club World Cup.
results.shortTitle: Liverpool to play twice within 24 hours
results.title: Liverpool Carabao Cup tie with Aston Villa unchanged despite Fifa Club World Cup clash

results.description: Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp calls to stop fixture congestion, saying "it's obvious that it's too much".
results.shortTitle: 'It's obvious that it's too much' - Klopp on fixture congestion
results.title: Jurgen Klopp: Liverpool boss on fixture congestion - 'It's obvious that it's too much'

results.description: Jurgen Klopp rules out fielding different teams in two competitions in two countries - possibly on the same day - to solve Liverpool's Carabao Cup quarter-final issue.
results.shortTitle: 'We can't leave players home for EFL Cup'
results.title: Jurgen Klopp: Liverpool boss rules out different Carabao Cup & Club World Cup teams

results.description: The Premier League is unlikely to allow Liverpool to move any top-flight fixtures to accommodate their EFL Cup quarter-final at Aston Villa.
results.shortTitle: Liverpool league game switch unlikely
results.title: Liverpool: Premier League game unlikely to move for Carabao Cup tie

thumbnail.altText: Liverpool celebrate beating Arsenal 5-4 on penalties after a 5-5 draw in the League Cup

results.description: Southampton boss Ralph Hasenhuttl says he is a "better manager than before" after a heavy week of defeats.
results.shortTitle: 'I am a better manager than before'
results.title: Ralph Hasenhuttl: Southampton boss says he is a 'better manager than before'

results.description: Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp says his side will not be able to play their Carabao Cup quarter-final if the game cannot be rearranged to avoid a clash with the Fifa Club World Cup.
results.shortTitle: Reds could be 'unable' to play EFL Cup tie - Klopp
results.title: Liverpool could be 'unable' to play Carabao Cup tie - Jurgen Klopp

results.description: Holders Manchester City are drawn away against League One side Oxford United in the quarter-finals of the Carabao Cup.
results.shortTitle: Man City to play at Oxford in EFL Cup
results.title: Carabao Cup: Man City at Oxford in quarter-finals, Man Utd host Colchester

thumbnail.altText: Oxford United beat Sunderland on penalties to reach the last eight of the Carabao Cup

results.description: Marcus Rashford scores a sensational free-kick winner as Manchester United beat Chelsea to reach the Carabao Cup quarter-finals - and is compared to Cristiano Ronaldo.
results.shortTitle: Rashford double sends Man Utd through
results.title: Chelsea 1-2 Manchester United: Marcus Rashford puts United into EFL Cup last eight

results.description: Goals from Anwar El Ghazi and Ahmed Elmohamady see Aston Villa edge past a youthful Wolves side to reach the quarter-finals of the Carabao Cup.
results.shortTitle: Villa edge Wolves to reach last eight
results.title: Aston Villa 2-1 Wolverhampton Wanderers

results.description: Liverpool beat Arsenal in a penalty shootout to decide a 10-goal thriller at Anfield in the fourth round of the Carabao Cup.
results.shortTitle: Shootout decides 10-goal Anfield thriller
results.title: Liverpool 5-5 (5-4) Arsenal: Shootout decides 10-goal thriller

results.description: Digionly
results.shortTitle: Liverpool win shootout after thriller
results.title: Digionly

results.description: Chelsea and Manchester Utd meet in the EFL Cup fourth round on Wednesday - but can you name the starting XIs from their last tie in 2012?
results.shortTitle: Name teams from last Chelsea-Man Utd EFL Cup tie
results.title: Chelsea v Man Utd quiz: Name teams from EFL Cup tie in 2012

thumbnail.altText: Roberto Di Matteo and Sir Alex Ferguson

results.description: BBC Sport speaks to fans from Arsenal, Chelsea, Liverpool and Man Utd about one of their young players who could star this week.
results.shortTitle: Young players to watch in the EFL Cup
results.title: Carabao Cup: Young players to look out for

thumbnail.altText: Emile Smith Rowe, Reece James, Harvey Elliott and Brandon Williams

results.description: Oxford United beat fellow League One side Sunderland on penalties to reach their first League Cup quarter-final since 1987-88.
results.shortTitle: Oxford beat Sunderland on penalties
results.title: Oxford beat Sunderland on penalties to reach EFL Cup quarter-finals

results.description: James Maddison's late goal seals Leicester's passage into the quarter-finals of the Carabao Cup at League One Burton.
results.shortTitle: Leicester beat Burton in EFL Cup
results.title: Burton Albion 1-3 Leicester City: James Maddison goal seals Foxes' progress into quarter-finals

results.description: Holders Manchester City eased into the quarter-finals of the EFL Cup after seeing off a Southampton side who were focused on damage limitation.
results.shortTitle: Man City beat Saints to reach quarters
results.title: Man City 3-1 Southampton: Sergio Aguero scores twice to put City into Carabao Cup quarters

results.description: Everton book their place in the quarter-finals of the EFL Cup thanks to second-half goals from Richarlison and Mason Holgate against Watford at Goodison Park.
results.shortTitle: Everton beat Watford in EFL Cup
results.title: Everton 2-0 Watford: Richarlison and Holgate seal Carabao Cup quarter-final spot

results.description: Colchester United reach the League Cup quarter-finals for the second time in their history by beating fellow League Two side Crawley Town.
results.shortTitle: Colchester reach EFL Cup quarter-finals
results.title: Crawley 1-3 Colchester: League Two side reach Carabao Cup quarter-finals
